MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Ceidio and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00PM to make repairs to an overhead line. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.49PM on 13th October 2020
